issue.title: [CF 1551] Icon disappears instead of showing
issue.body:
hey. I used a lua condition with this  x=="on" for tmw and macro to turn it on /run x="on". now icon shows only a while and disappears right away


> Posted by CurseForge user Ivasx | Imported from CurseForge issue #1551 | Raw

comments.body:
Use a better variable than x. Some other addon you use is setting some other value to x.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
